about_the_game:
This Soundtrack contains the entire Official Soundtrack to CousinCatnip's visual novel experience: What Is Sleeping In My Room?

Over 60 songs are available including:
  • All main songs and themes (including variations)
  • Unused Songs that were not in the final product
  • The different soundscapes that happen throughout the game

The music in the game focused on complimenting what was happening in the story so there is a wide variety in regards to genres, styles and motifs.
